metadata.title: CVE-2020-11709 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: cpp-httplib through 0.5.8 does not filter \r\n in parameters passed intothe set_redirect and set_header functions, which creates possibilities forCRLF injection and HTTP response splitting in some specific contexts.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
